## Requirements

The following requirements are needed by this module:

- <a name="requirement_terraform"></a> [terraform](#requirement\_terraform) (>= 1.6, < 2.0)

- <a name="requirement_azapi"></a> [azapi](#requirement\_azapi) (>= 2.0.0, < 3.0.0)

- <a name="requirement_azurerm"></a> [azurerm](#requirement\_azurerm) (>= 3.71.0, < 5.0.0)

## Resources

The following resources are used by this module:

- [azapi_resource.file_share](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/Azure/azapi/latest/docs/resources/resource) (resource)
- [azurerm_client_config.current](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/azurerm/latest/docs/data-sources/client_config) (data source)

## Required Inputs

The following input variables are required:

### <a name="input_enable_telemetry"></a> [enable\_telemetry](#input\_enable\_telemetry)

Description: Enable deployment telemetry

Type: `bool`

### <a name="input_location"></a> [location](#input\_location)

Description: Azure location

Type: `string`

### <a name="input_resource_group_id"></a> [resource\_group\_id](#input\_resource\_group\_id)

Description: Resource Group ID where supporting services will be created

Type: `string`

### <a name="input_resource_group_name"></a> [resource\_group\_name](#input\_resource\_group\_name)

Description: Resource Group name where supporting services will be created

Type: `string`

### <a name="input_resources_names"></a> [resources\_names](#input\_resources\_names)

Description: Resource names map (from naming module)

Type:

```hcl
object({
    resourceGroup                         = string
    containerRegistry                     = string
    containerRegistryPep                  = string
    containerRegistryUserAssignedIdentity = string
    keyVault                              = string
    keyVaultPep                           = string
    storageAccount                        = string
  })
```

### <a name="input_spoke_private_endpoint_subnet_resource_id"></a> [spoke\_private\_endpoint\_subnet\_resource\_id](#input\_spoke\_private\_endpoint\_subnet\_resource\_id)

Description: Spoke Private Endpoint subnet ID

Type: `string`

### <a name="input_spoke_vnet_resource_id"></a> [spoke\_vnet\_resource\_id](#input\_spoke\_vnet\_resource\_id)

Description: Spoke VNet resource ID

Type: `string`

## Optional Inputs

The following input variables are optional (have default values):

### <a name="input_enable_diagnostics"></a> [enable\_diagnostics](#input\_enable\_diagnostics)

Description: Enable diagnostics settings for supporting services

Type: `bool`

Default: `true`

### <a name="input_hub_peering_enabled"></a> [hub\_peering\_enabled](#input\_hub\_peering\_enabled)

Description: Whether hub peering is enabled. Used to determine if hub VNet link should be created.

Type: `bool`

Default: `false`

### <a name="input_hub_vnet_resource_id"></a> [hub\_vnet\_resource\_id](#input\_hub\_vnet\_resource\_id)

Description: Hub VNet resource ID. Required when hub\_peering\_enabled is true.

Type: `string`

Default: `null`

### <a name="input_log_analytics_workspace_id"></a> [log\_analytics\_workspace\_id](#input\_log\_analytics\_workspace\_id)

Description: Log Analytics Workspace resource ID (optional)

Type: `string`

Default: `null`

### <a name="input_tags"></a> [tags](#input\_tags)

Description: Tags to apply

Type: `map(string)`

Default: `null`

### <a name="input_zone_redundant_resources_enabled"></a> [zone\_redundant\_resources\_enabled](#input\_zone\_redundant\_resources\_enabled)

Description: If true, use AZ-enabled SKUs where supported

Type: `bool`

Default: `true`
